name: 艾玛·布莱思
introduction: Emma Blyth was raised outside of Chicago in the twin cities of Bloomington/ Normal. She studied acting at Roosevelt University's conservatory school, Chicago College for the Performing Arts. She later moved to Los Angeles and currently enjoys working professionally in both Los Angeles and Chicago.Emma recently wrapped production on her fourth feature film called, Eyes Upon Waking in which she played the role of Heather, a young woman in an inpatient psychiatric facility following a suicide attempt.Outside of acting Emma enjoys reading, singing and caring for her beloved pets, Sutter and Chicken.
